original_text: Therefore thus says the Lord God: As I live, surely it is my oath that he despised, and my covenant that he broke. I will return it upon his head.
korean_text: 그러므로 주 여호와의 말씀이니라 내가 나의 삶을 두고 맹세하노니 그가 내 맹세를 업신여기고 내 언약을 배반하였은즉 내가 그 죄를 그 머리에 돌리되

sentences.original_text: Therefore thus says the Lord God
surely it is my oath that he despised
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 경멸한 것은 분명 나의 맹세요

sentences.original_text: and my covenant that he broke
I will return it upon his head
